text:
@BrianKarem @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Has the President informed herself or you when he plans to go golfing again ? 

#COVID19 is a mess , USA deaths & cases about to mushroom . 

We get it - COVID19=bad ratings boo hoo 

Do your jobs or just walk away
